name: Beautiful passageway

exits.description: There is nothing but paintings in this direction.
You see beautiful paintings but you can not go this direction.

sunlight filters through the hallway to your west.
You see beautiful paintings but you can not go this direction.
Even the ceiling has paintings suspended from it.
The tile here is so squeaky clean you can see your reflection.

description: Beautiful paintings reflect the meager light trickling through this East-West passageway.
